flawed_nl_solution:
The first game was 100*0.8=<<100*0.8=80>>80 hours of grinding
So it was 100-80=<<100-80=22>>22 hours of good gameplay
The expansion brought the time of good gameplay to 22+30=<<22+30=52>>52 hours

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20.0, not 22.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
